ghosts.name: Spirit
ghosts.strength: No unique strengths.
ghosts.weakness: Smudge sticks prevent it from hunting for a long period (Cannot hunt for 3mins).
ghosts.behavior: A standard ghost with no special behaviors.

ghosts.name: Wraith
ghosts.strength: Cannot be tracked by footsteps.
ghosts.weakness: Salt repels it, causing it to avoid the area (e.g Cannot step in salt).
ghosts.behavior: Often teleports to players' locations.

ghosts.name: Phantom
ghosts.strength: Looking at the Phantom significantly drops your sanity.
ghosts.weakness: Taking a photo of the Phantom will cause it to disappear temporarily.
ghosts.behavior: Will disappear when a photo is taken, making it hard to track.

ghosts.name: Poltergeist
ghosts.strength: Can throw multiple objects at once.
ghosts.weakness: Becomes powerless with no objects nearby.
ghosts.behavior: Throws objects frequently, creating high activity.

ghosts.name: Banshee
ghosts.strength: Targets one player at a time.
ghosts.weakness: Can be identified using a parabolic microphone.
ghosts.behavior: Will prioritize its target even during hunts.

ghosts.name: Jinn
ghosts.strength: Travels faster if the victim is far away.
ghosts.weakness: Turning off the breaker prevents it from using its ability.
ghosts.behavior: Prefers to leave the breaker on and uses it for speed boosts.
ghosts.speed: 1.7 m/s (normal), 2.5 m/s (when chasing from a distance)

ghosts.name: Mare
ghosts.strength: More likely to attack in the dark.
ghosts.weakness: Turning on the lights will make it less aggressive.
ghosts.behavior: Prefers darkness, will turn off lights frequently.

ghosts.name: Revenant
ghosts.strength: Moves extremely fast when hunting its target.
ghosts.weakness: Moves very slowly when not hunting.
ghosts.behavior: Can rapidly close the distance if it sees you.

ghosts.name: Shade
ghosts.strength: Very shy, less active around multiple players.
ghosts.weakness: Hard to detect due to its shyness.
ghosts.behavior: Less likely to interact when many players are nearby.

ghosts.name: Demon
ghosts.strength: Hunts more often than any other ghost.
ghosts.weakness: Crucifixes are more effective against Demons.
ghosts.behavior: Will hunt aggressively and frequently.

ghosts.name: Yurei
ghosts.strength: Drains sanity faster than other ghosts.
ghosts.weakness: Smudge sticks reduce its activity more than usual.
ghosts.behavior: Sanity drains much faster when near it.

ghosts.name: Hantu
ghosts.strength: Moves faster in colder environments.
ghosts.weakness: Slower in warm environments.
ghosts.behavior: Prefers colder rooms, speed varies based on temperature.

ghosts.name: Oni
ghosts.strength: More active around groups of people.
ghosts.weakness: Easier to find due to high activity.
ghosts.behavior: Loves to interact and move objects frequently.

ghosts.name: Yokai
ghosts.strength: Can hunt at higher sanity if players talk near it.
ghosts.weakness: Can only hear voices close to it during hunts.
ghosts.behavior: Triggered by player voices, becomes more aggressive.

ghosts.name: Goryo
ghosts.strength: Only shows itself on camera if no one is nearby.
ghosts.weakness: Rarely seen far from its place of death.
ghosts.behavior: Appears only in DOTS when viewed through a camera.

ghosts.name: Myling
ghosts.strength: Quieter during hunts.
ghosts.weakness: Produces more paranormal sounds on a parabolic microphone.
ghosts.behavior: Silent when hunting, making it harder to detect.

ghosts.name: Onryo
ghosts.strength: Can hunt earlier when candles are extinguished.
ghosts.weakness: Candles can prevent it from hunting.
ghosts.behavior: Uses candles as a hunting trigger.
ghosts.hunt_threshold: 50% sanity (lower if multiple candles go out)

ghosts.name: The Twins
ghosts.strength: Can act independently, sometimes attacking simultaneously.
ghosts.weakness: One is faster, one is slower.
ghosts.behavior: Can trigger multiple interactions at different locations.

ghosts.name: Raiju
ghosts.strength: Moves faster near active electronic equipment.
ghosts.weakness: Disrupts electronic equipment at greater distances.
ghosts.behavior: Becomes dangerous if electronics are left on.

ghosts.name: Obake
ghosts.strength: Can change its fingerprints, making it difficult to identify.
ghosts.weakness: Sometimes leaves unique handprints that reveal its identity.
ghosts.behavior: Rarely changes forms but leaves unpredictable evidence.

ghosts.name: The Mimic
ghosts.strength: Can imitate the traits of other ghosts.
ghosts.weakness: Always has Ghost Orbs, despite not requiring them as evidence.
ghosts.behavior: Mimics different ghost behaviors, making identification difficult.

ghosts.name: Moroi
ghosts.strength: Becomes faster as players lose sanity.
ghosts.weakness: Can be temporarily blinded by smudge sticks for a longer time.
ghosts.behavior: Hunts aggressively when player sanity is low.
ghosts.speed: 1.7 m/s (up to 2.9 m/s at low sanity)

ghosts.name: Deogen
ghosts.strength: Always knows your location during a hunt.
ghosts.weakness: Moves extremely slowly when close to its target.
ghosts.behavior: Starts fast but slows dramatically when near a player.

ghosts.name: Thaye
ghosts.strength: Starts out fast and aggressive.
ghosts.weakness: Slows down significantly over time.
ghosts.behavior: Aging mechanic causes it to become less active as time progresses.
ghosts.speed: Starts at 2.75 m/s, slows over time

Ouija Board.description: Allows communication with the ghost at the cost of sanity.
Ouija Board.usage: Ask the ghost questions to gain clues, but beware of sanity drain.
Ouija Board.risk: Breaks if sanity is too low, triggering a cursed hunt.

Music Box.description: Plays a lullaby that makes the ghost sing along, revealing its location.
Music Box.usage: Place near the ghost to hear it sing and pinpoint its room.
Music Box.risk: If used too long, it triggers a cursed hunt.

Tarot Cards.description: Draws random effects, including sanity boosts, death, or revival.
Tarot Cards.usage: Use at your own risk; cards have different effects based on the draw.
Tarot Cards.risk: Can instantly kill the user if the 'Hanged Man' card is drawn.

Haunted Mirror.description: Shows the ghost room but drains sanity rapidly.
Haunted Mirror.usage: Look into the mirror to see the ghost’s room directly.
Haunted Mirror.risk: If sanity reaches 0%, the mirror breaks and triggers a cursed hunt.

Summoning Circle.description: Summons the ghost for a photo but immediately starts a hunt.
Summoning Circle.usage: Light all candles in the circle to bring the ghost to one spot.
Summoning Circle.risk: Guaranteed to start a cursed hunt after activation.

Voodoo Doll.description: Interacts with the ghost, potentially triggering a hunt.
Voodoo Doll.usage: Poke the doll to force interactions and gather clues.
Voodoo Doll.risk: Has a chance to immediately start a hunt upon use.

Monkey Paw.description: A cursed item that grants wishes with unexpected consequences.
Monkey Paw.usage: Speak a wish aloud while holding the Monkey Paw. The wish may be granted, but with a trade-off.
Monkey Paw.risk: Each wish comes with unintended side effects. Some may increase ghost aggression or cause sanity loss.

hunt_thresholds.Banshee: Can hunt at any sanity if its target is low
hunt_thresholds.Onryo: Can hunt at higher sanity if multiple candles are extinguished
hunt_thresholds.Thaye: Starts at 75% sanity and lowers over time
hunt_thresholds.Moroi: Hunts earlier the lower the player’s sanity is

speeds.The Twins: One moves faster (2.2 m/s), one moves slower (1.4 m/s)
speeds.Thaye: Starts at 2.75 m/s and slows over time
speeds.Moroi: Becomes faster when players have lower sanity (up to 2.9 m/s)
